name: Mountain Climbing Simulator
description:
It's easy and new game about mountain climbing.

You must climb to highest mountain and be patient, beacuse you will be so many times, fell and must start again.

This game is simulator connecting with logic and action,

Beacuse you must find the best place to start climbing and have really manually

good hand, such as it is using keys are the most important thing.

I really apreciate if you will tell me your oppinion beacuse its my first game, for now is available one big map with some many kind of mountain.

In future i will add campaign, short mission, rescue mission and etc.

I hope you enjoy!

MOUNTAIN CLIMBING SIMULATOR.

(Everybody's who buy game for 1$ will be have Free Forever update of this game and free dlcs)
